meanings.definition: An uncomfortable sensation on the skin causing a desire to scratch.
meanings.sent1: The prurituses on my arm made me itch uncontrollably.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist scratching her skin due to the prurituses bothering her.
meanings.sent3: The prurituses seemed to play a prank on me, making me scratch at invisible bugs.
meanings.sent4: The prurituses danced across his skin like mischievous sprites, urging him to scratch.
meanings.sent5: The intense prurituses felt like tiny ants crawling under my skin, demanding to be scratched.

meanings.sent1: In the medical report, the doctor noted multiple prurituses experienced by the patient.
meanings.sent2: The prurituses mentioned in the study were common among the participants.
meanings.sent3: The prurituses in the room seemed to multiply, creating a chorus of itching.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was filled with a swarm of prurituses, each one demanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The prurituses whispered their itch-inducing secrets to anyone who would listen.
